thread.title: Young amateur footballer tragically dies after collapsing during game - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Young amateur footballer tragically dies after collapsing during game - Mirror Online

author: Mirror .Co.Uk
title: Young amateur footballer tragically dies after collapsing during game - Mirror Online
text:
News Young amateur footballer tragically dies after collapsing during game The man, who has not been named, was playing in Langtoft AFC in East Yorkshire on Saturday afternoon when he fell to the floor Share Tributes have been paid to the footballer who was playing for Langtoft AFC (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A young amateur footballer has tragically died after collapsing during a game. 
The man, who has not been named, was playing for Langtoft AFC in East Yorkshire on Saturday afternoon when he fell to the floor. 
Despite the emergency services response, he was unable to recover and died, the Hull Daily Mail reports . 
A spokeswoman for Yorkshire Ambulance Service said: "I can confirm that Yorkshire Ambulance Service were called at 3.24pm on Saturday afternoon to reports of a male who had collapsed on the playing fields at Rudston. 
"We sent a rapid response vehicle, a first responder vehicle, two ambulances and Yorkshire Air Ambulance also attended but sadly the patient died at the scene." 
One man posted on Facebook: "Thoughts go out to the family and friends of the lad who passed away playing for Langtoft today big shame." Like us on Facebook
